Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Barbara:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te ]selet n~te pi<rictoc: ]a~gia~ m~m/i Barbara: P[oic arih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of the bride of Christ: the righteous Saint Barbara, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
